title: Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby order as

text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco Products and 

Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.

text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Public Health (Tobacco 

Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023).

title: Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 3. The 29th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
3. The 29th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 

33 of the Act of 2023 shall come into operation.

title: Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 4. The 23rd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
4. The 23rd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which 

sections 29, 30 and 31 of the Act of 2023 shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 March, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th March, 2024.
